# WidgetFamily.systemMedium

**Case**

A medium-sized widget.

## Declaration

```swift
case systemMedium
```

## Discussion

The medium system widget can appear on the Home Screen or in the Today View in iOS and iPadOS. In macOS, the medium system widget can appear on the desktop or in Notification Center.

## Accessing system families

- **WidgetFamily.systemSmall**: A small widget.
- **WidgetFamily.systemLarge**: A large widget.
- **WidgetFamily.systemExtraLarge**: An extra-large widget.
- **WidgetFamily.systemExtraLargePortrait**: An extra-large widget that uses a portrait orientation.

items.description: An extra-large widget that uses a portrait orientation.
